title: Low fps with gtx 1060
body: Recently (I think ever since I updated my graphics card drivers) I have been getting weird fps. It jump between 150 and 70ish with even lower dips in team fights. It is very noticeable and makes everything feel choppy. The problem started happening the other day with me being locked to 60 fps no matter what I did. I saw a thread about disabling the windows game bar app because it causes issues so I did that and it fixed the locked fps problem, but now I have this choppiness. I am not sure what to do at this point. I even tried putting my setting to very low but the fps doesn't change at all which is weird. Any ideas would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body: Check your in-game settings, and see if capping your frame rate might help.  If you still have issues, create a custom game and see if the steps in our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide helps improve things a bit.
I have tried capping the fps at 60 but it just feels choppy and sluggish. Have also tried most if not all of the suggestions in the fps issue guide. Thanks for your reply.

Thanks for the update, that sucks to hear though.  In that case, grab some logs through our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and submit them in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll have our tech team look into this with you directly to see what the deal is.
i have the same thing, i had 300 fps before now i have 150- someimtes 80 and alot of freeezes. can i send a ticket too?
